creditline: Gift of Harold and Margaret Sims
description: Jomon Zogan rectangular bottle with wave pattern on all four sides; herringbone pattern visible underneath waves; glaze for waves alternates between off-white, blue, and pink; overall glaze on bottle is greenish gray with darker, red-hued brown at edges and portion of lip at bottle neck
medium: Glazed stoneware with inlaid slip decor
title: Slip-inlaid rope-pattern jar with shoulders
